backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented landing page gallery features and related files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including landing page components and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config with OKLCH variable definitions and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, root div, and script loader.
frontend/src/components/landing/BookingS: WhatsApp-enabled booking form with validation and service selection.
frontend/src/components/landing/Coverage: Static coverage text for Ahmedabad and Gandhinagar.
frontend/src/components/landing/Floating: Floating WhatsApp shortcut button fixed to bottom-right.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero banner with background image and call/WhatsApp CTAs.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Footer with branding, action buttons, copyright, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingN: Sticky navigation bar with call button and smooth-scroll booking link.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Assembles all landing page sections including new OurWorkSection.
frontend/src/components/landing/OurWorkS: Three-item AC work gallery with responsive grid and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/landing/Services: Renders a grid of AC service cards using predefined icons, titles, and descriptions. Provides a styled landing page section for showcasing available services.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreasSect: Displays grouped service areas with Gujarati titles in a styled grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes. Returns the active actor and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status states. Wraps the app with an identity provider for AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for theming, including light/dark mode and service-specific colors. Applies global styles such as smooth scrolling and default borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering. Imports global styles and the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, shadows, animations, and plugin integrations. Loads theme values from CSS variables and defines content paths.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, listing implemented features for an ICP dapp scaffold with React, Tailwind, shadcn, and Internet Identity, plus landing page additions.
